Detailed Description

Portal class.

Objects of this class are used in room-portal system to determine visibility of rooms. These objects can not be drew, they are used only for computing, but portals may contain list of 3D objects, which belong to the two rooms simultaneously and can be drew. Generally portals are placed into passageway between rooms.

void SetBorder (  const Fixed *  border_  ) 
 

Sets portal's border.

Portal's border consist of four vertexes.

Parameters:
border_ - vertex coordinates array. This array have to include 12 elements (4 vert. * 3 coord.)
